desc: Only the best sweet, green, dust-free boxes of hay from our farm in Leicestershire, UK. Timothy, Oat, Meadow, Orchard, Rye Grass, and Crau Hay are available. Perfect for rabbits or guinea pigs. Next Day Delivery & Subscription options. Order your free sample today!

layout.text: Your Pet Deserves Only the Best
New and improved Orchard hay now available!

Made only last week,
It just doesn't get fresher than this!
